description: This file defines a Fragment for displaying VOD items in a grid, with adapters and view holders for rendering each item, and handles user interactions such as playing a video or toggling favorites.

classes.name: VodFragment
classes.description: Main Fragment displaying a grid of VOD items with options to play videos and toggle favorites.

classes.name: VodAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView Adapter for VodItem objects, managing item views and user interactions.

classes.name: VodViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder for VodAdapter, binding VodItem data to the UI and setting click listeners.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up RecyclerView with grid layout and adapter, and defines item interaction behavior.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of VodFragment.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates item layout and creates a VodViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds VodItem data to ViewHolder and sets up interaction callbacks.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns total number of VOD items.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds VodItem data to UI elements and sets click listeners for play and favorite actions.
